events.message: I am filing a claim due to severe water damage caused by the recent storm that impacted my house, resulting in significant ceiling leaks.
The claim has been categorized as Home Damage after assessing the initial description of roof and ceiling leaks following the storm.
An insurance agent has been assigned to manage this roof leak and water damage claim to assist the customer moving forward.
We acknowledge receipt of your claim regarding the storm damage to your home and assure you of prompt assistance.
Kindly submit photos of the damaged roof and water-affected areas along with your property insurance policy documents.
All requested documents, including detailed photos and a repair estimate from a licensed contractor, have been submitted successfully.
Our claims department has begun investigating the extent of water damage and verifying the submitted documentation for accuracy.
The investigation concluded positively confirming that the damage is covered under the policy and repair costs are justified.
We have proposed a settlement amount to cover repair costs and expect your review and agreement to proceed.
The customer has reviewed the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the offer and the handling of their claim.
The claim has been formally approved following customer agreement and all internal procedures have been completed.
Payment for the approved damage repairs has been issued to the customerâ€™s designated account without delay.
The claim for water damage after the storm has been closed successfully following payment and final confirmation from the customer.
